title: Venus in Aquarius
summary: Affection is unconventional, intellectual, and future-oriented. Friendship, community, and shared causes shape connection. The opportunity is to honor individuality while staying present to feelings.

meaning.headline: Relating values freedom, authenticity, and collaboration.

frames.text: Venus in Aquarius emphasizes friendship energy, openness to difference, and innovative approaches to relating.
Shared ideals or projects can be bonding.
Detachment can help conversations stay objective.
Group activities or causes feel appealing.
Emotional needs should be sidelined in favor of logic.

frictions: Avoiding intimacy by staying in the friend zone
Over-relying on texts or online contact
Assuming everyone is comfortable with nontraditional dynamics
opportunities: Connecting through shared interests or activism

do: State your boundaries and freedoms clearly.
Balance heady talk with moments of feeling.
Include quieter voices in group settings.
Share the reasoning behind unconventional choices.
Offer consistent check-ins even if tone stays cool.

reusable_lines.text: Make space for individuality while keeping the connection human.
Ideas can spark closeness when paired with empathy.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can encourage authentic, innovative relating
Agency-forward language: you choose the agreements that fit
Contextual framing: objectivity helps when feelings are included

sources: Venus as relating/values archetype in daily cycles
